mapper.insert: insert into question(questionNum, questionType, wname, title, content, phone, passwd, wdate) values((select nvl(max(questionNum),0)+1 from question), #{questionType}, #{wname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd}, sysdate)
mapper.select:
select questionNum, questionType, wname, title, wdate, r from ( select questionNum, questionType, wname, title, wdate, rownum as r from( select questionNum, questionType, wname, title, to_char(wdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as wdate from question
questionType like '%'||#{word}||'%'
wname like '%'||#{word}||'%'
title like '%'||#{word}||'%'
content like '%'||#{word}||'%'
title like '%'||#{word}||'%' or content like '%'||#{word}||'%'
order by questionNum desc ) )
where r >= #{sno} and r <= #{eno}
